faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Telobook

items.question: How does Telobook help reduce no-shows?
items.answer: Telobook notifies users about their upcoming appointments at the time of booking. Clients receive all the details they need to remember their appointment, which helps reduce no-shows and last-minute cancellations. You can also set up booking rules to ensure clients confirm their appointments.

items.question: Can I integrate Telobook with my existing website?
items.answer: Yes! Telobook provides a personalized booking link that you can share on your website, social media, or directly with clients. Clients can use this link to view your services and book appointments without you needing to manually manage the process.

items.question: Is Telobook suitable for different types of beauty services?
items.answer: Absolutely. Telobook is designed to work for all types of beauty professionals including hair stylists, nail technicians, makeup artists, estheticians, massage therapists, and more. You can customize your services, durations, and pricing to match your specific offerings.

items.question: How do I manage my availability in Telobook?
items.answer: Telobook makes it easy to set your working hours, breaks, and days off. You can create custom schedules for different days of the week, block out vacation time, and even set buffer times between appointments to ensure you have enough time for preparation and cleanup.

items.question: When will multi-staff support be available?
items.answer: Multi-staff support is coming soon in our Business plan. This feature will allow salon owners and spa managers to manage multiple service providers, each with their own schedules, services, and client lists, all from a centralized dashboard.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

items.title: User-Centric Design
items.description: Every feature we build starts with you, the service professional. We design our platform to be intuitive, efficient, and tailored to your specific needs.

items.title: Trust & Transparency
items.description: We believe in being transparent about our features, pricing, and roadmap. Your trust is our most valuable asset, and we work hard to maintain it.

items.title: Continuous Improvement
items.description: We're constantly evolving based on your feedback. Our development is guided by real user experiences and industry best practices.

items.title: Accessibility For All
items.description: We're committed to making Telobook accessible to service professionals of all backgrounds, skill levels, and business sizes.

hero.title: Streamline Your Service Business with Telobook
hero.description: The all-in-one booking solution for independent professionals and service providers. Manage appointments, clients, and services in one place.

features.title: Powerful Features for Service Professionals
features.description: Everything you need to streamline your booking process and grow your business.

calendar.title: Smart Calendar
calendar.description: Manage your schedule with an intuitive calendar interface. View daily, weekly, or monthly appointments at a glance.

clientManagement.title: Client Management
clientManagement.description: Keep track of all your clients, their contact information, appointment history, and preferences in one place.

onlineBooking.title: Online Booking
onlineBooking.description: Let clients book appointments online 24/7. Reduce phone calls and save time with automated scheduling.

serviceManagement.title: Service Management
serviceManagement.description: Create and manage your service offerings, including pricing, duration, and availability.

bookingNotifications.title: Booking Notifications
bookingNotifications.description: Clients receive booking confirmations and can add appointments to their personal calendars.

aiBookingAssistant.title: AI Booking Assistant
aiBookingAssistant.description: Let clients ask about your services, pricing, and availability through a natural chat interface. The AI answers their questions and handles bookings without you needing to explain the same details repeatedly.

aiBusinessAssistant.title: AI Business Assistant
aiBusinessAssistant.description: Get instant answers about your business, upcoming schedule, and performance metrics just by asking in natural language.

multiStaff.title: Multi-Staff Support
multiStaff.description: Perfect for businesses with multiple service providers. Manage staff schedules and availability.

analytics.title: Business Analytics
analytics.description: Gain insights into your business performance with detailed reports on bookings, revenue, and client retention.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.description: Join hundreds of service professionals who trust Telobook.

testimonial1.name: Maria Rodriguez
testimonial1.quote: Telobook has transformed my business. I've reduced no-shows by 95% and my clients love how easy it is to book appointments.

testimonial2.name: James Wilson
testimonial2.quote: The calendar interface is so intuitive. I can manage my entire schedule from my phone while on the go.

testimonial3.name: Sophie Chen
testimonial3.quote: The client management feature has been a game-changer. I can keep track of all client preferences and history in one place.

secureReliable.description: Your data and your clients' information are protected with industry-standard security practices.

builtForPros.title: Built for Service Pros
builtForPros.description: Created specifically for independent professionals with features tailored to streamline your booking and client management needs.

growBusiness.title: Grow Your Business
growBusiness.description: Attract new clients and retain existing ones with professional online booking and a streamlined appointment system.

mobileFriendly.title: Mobile Friendly
mobileFriendly.description: Manage your business from anywhere with a fully responsive design that works on all devices.

constantlyImproving.title: Constantly Improving
constantlyImproving.description: We regularly add new features based on user feedback to ensure Telobook meets your evolving needs.

serviceProviderModal.bookingTimeFrameHelp: This sets how far into the future clients can book. For example, '30' means they can book up to 30 days ahead.
serviceProviderModal.maxFutureBookingsHelp: This sets how many upcoming appointments a single client can have. For example, '2' means a client can't hold more than 2 future bookings at the same time.

minBookingStartTime.title: Minimum Advance Booking Time
minBookingStartTime.description: This setting allows you to specify the minimum number of hours required between the current time and the start of a booking. If a time slot is within this minimum period, it will not be shown to users.
minBookingStartTime.example: For example, if this is set to 2 hours and it is currently 10:00, users will only see booking slots starting from 12:00 onward.

slotGeneration.fromStartDescription: Start making appointment slots from the earliest free time and move forward until you can't fit any more full slots.
slotGeneration.fromStartScenario: For example, if you start at 09:00 with a 30-minute service, you'll get 09:00-09:30, 09:30-10:00, and so on.
slotGeneration.fromEndDescription: Start from the latest free time and move backward until no more full slots can fit.
slotGeneration.fromEndScenario: For example, if you end at 18:00 with a 30-minute service, you'll get 17:30-18:00, 17:00-17:30, etc.
slotGeneration.customIntervalDescription: Start from the earliest free time and add new slots every chosen interval. Each slot is the full service duration.
slotGeneration.customIntervalScenario: For example, starting at 09:00 with a 30-minute service and a 15-minute interval, you get 09:00-09:30, 09:15-09:45, 09:30-10:00, etc.

services.advancedBookingManagementDescription: A sophisticated system that allows service providers to manage and optimize their bookings efficiently, enhancing customer attraction and streamlining operations.
services.transparentPricingDisplayDescription: Feature ensuring clear and upfront display of service prices, fostering trust and simplifying decision-making for clients.
services.qualityAssuranceStandardsDescription: A system to showcase cleanliness and professional qualifications of service providers, enhancing trust and quality perception among clients.
services.customerAttractionDescription: Tools for service providers to attract new customers through client reviews, ratings, and social media sharing capabilities.
services.communityDrivenFeatureDescription: A platform feature allowing users to suggest, vote on, and track new features, fostering a strong, engaged community.
services.personalizedClientExperienceDescription: A recommendation engine and customizable filters for clients to find services that match their specific needs and preferences.

consentModal.dataConsentDescription: We use personal data to enhance your experience. Please read and accept our Privacy Policy.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Consent Notice
privacyPolicy.introduction: Welcome to Telobook. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal data. This Privacy Consent Notice explains how and why we collect, process, and store your personal information when you use our booking platform.

section1.title: 1. Data Controller Contact Information
section1.content: Telobook is the data controller responsible for your personal data. For any questions, concerns, or requests regarding your personal information or your rights under GDPR, please contact us at: privacy@telobook.com.

section2.title: 2. Data We Collect
section2.content: We collect data in two ways: the information you provide and automatically collected data.

subsectionA.title: a. Data You Provide Directly
subsectionA.content: This includes your email address, phone number, full name, and profession. This information is processed only when you provide it, such as during registration or booking.

subsectionB.title: b. Automatically Collected Data
subsectionB.content: We automatically collect technical and preference data to enhance our service. This includes your theme color preferences, IP address, language preference, and location data. Such data is collected through our integrated third-party services, including Datadog and OneSignal.

section3.title: 3. Purposes and Legal Bases for Processing
section3.content: We process your data for the following purposes:

list.serviceDelivery: To facilitate bookings, manage your account, and provide customer support (Legal Basis: Performance of a contract).
list.personalization: To send booking confirmations, service updates, and notifications, and to personalize your experience (Legal Basis: Your explicit consent).
list.securityMonitoring: To monitor system performance, enhance security, and improve our services (Legal Basis: Legitimate interests).
list.legalCompliance: To comply with applicable laws and regulations (Legal Basis: Compliance with legal obligations).

section4.title: 4. Data Sharing and International Transfers
section4.content: We share your personal data only with trusted third-party providers (e.g., OneSignal and Datadog) who assist us with our services. We ensure that these third parties use your data solely for the purposes described, and that appropriate safeguards are in place if data is transferred outside the European Economic Area (EEA).

section5.title: 5. Data Retention
section5.content: Your personal data will be retained only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this notice or as required by applicable laws. When no longer needed, your data will be securely deleted or anonymized.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights Under GDPR
section6.content: You have the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict processing, obtain data portability, object to processing, and withdraw your consent at any time. To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@telobook.com.

section7.title: 7. Consent and Withdrawal
section7.content: By clicking one of the consent buttons or continuing to use Telobook, you confirm that you have read and understood this Privacy Consent Notice and consent to the collection and processing of your personal data as described. You may withdraw your consent at any time by contacting us, though this may affect your ability to use certain features of our platform.

section8.title: 8. Updates and Future Notifications
section8.content: We may update this Privacy Consent Notice from time to time. In the event of significant changes, this popup may reappear to notify you of the updates. Please review this notice regularly to stay informed about how we protect your personal data.

notifications.permissionDenied: Please enable notifications in your browser settings.
notifications.howToEnableSiteNotificationsIntro: To enable notifications at the site level, follow these steps:
notifications.howToEnableOnIOSIntro: Due to iOS limitations, please follow these steps:
notifications.siteLevelDenialMessage: Notifications are blocked for Telobook. Please enable them in your browser's site settings.
notifications.browserLevelDenialMessage: Notifications are disabled in your browser settings. Please enable them to receive updates.
notifications.osLevelDenialMessage: Notifications are disabled in your device settings. Please enable them to receive updates.
notifications.siteLevelTutorialIntro: To enable notifications for Telobook, follow these steps:
notifications.siteLevelStep2: 2. Navigate to Privacy and Security > Site Settings > Notifications.
notifications.siteLevelStep3: 3. Find Telobook in the list of blocked sites and change it to Allow.
notifications.browserLevelTutorialIntro: To enable notifications in your browser, follow these steps:
notifications.browserLevelStep2: 2. Navigate to Privacy and Security > Site Settings > Notifications.
notifications.browserLevelStep3: 3. Ensure that 'Sites can ask to send notifications' is enabled.
notifications.osLevelTutorialIntro: To enable notifications in your device settings, follow these steps:
notifications.osLevelStep1: 1. Open the Settings app on your device.
notifications.osLevelStep2: 2. Scroll down and select Telobook or your browser.
notifications.permissionDeniedTutorial: Notifications are blocked. Please enable them in your browser or device settings.
notifications.iOSTutorial: Special steps are required for iOS devices to enable notifications.
notifications.generalDebuggingIntro: If you're still experiencing issues, try the following steps:
notifications.additionalDebuggingSteps: If the above steps didn't work, please try the following:
notifications.debuggingStep1: - Clear your browser's cache and cookies, then try again.
notifications.debuggingStep2: - Ensure that you're using the latest version of your browser or app.
notifications.debuggingStep3: - Disable any extensions or plugins that might block notifications.
notifications.debuggingStep4: - Restart your device to apply any pending updates.
notifications.iosPwaLevelDenialMessage: To receive notifications on iOS, please add this app to your home screen.
notifications.iosSafariLevelDenialMessage: To receive notifications on iOS, please use Safari browser.
notifications.iosPwaTutorialTitle: Add to Home Screen on iOS
notifications.iosPwaTutorialIntro: To add the app to your home screen, follow these steps:
notifications.iosPwaStep1: 1. Tap the Share icon at the bottom of the Safari browser.
notifications.iosPwaStep2: 2. Scroll down and select 'Add to Home Screen'.
notifications.iosSafariTutorialIntro: To use this app and receive notifications, please open it in the Safari browser.
notifications.iosSafariStep1: 1. Copy the URL and paste it into Safari.
notifications.unsupportedLevelDenialMessage: Notifications are not supported on your device or browser.
notifications.unsupportedTutorialIntro: Unfortunately, your device or browser does not support notifications. Please consider using a different device or browser to receive notifications.
notifications.unsupportedStep1: Try accessing the app on a different device or update your browser.
